pullRequest.title: Gh 791 add named operation group label (part of tools Issue #791)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Hi - here is the back end change for Issue #791 (in gaffer-tools) - it's ready to go in to develop anytime by itself.
This backend feature in this PR is just enabling NamedOperationDetail to include a label and it is safe to merge anytime - as I'm still working on the gaffer-tools UI to send the request down.
It is compatible with the current request that gaffer-tools and Swagger sends (i.e. it sends AddNamedOperation request with "label" missing from body - the backend will read this as null).
Let me know what you think, thanks

commit.message: Added label field to AddNamedOperation & Detail
Merge branch 'develop' of github.com:gchq/Gaffer into gh-791-add-named-operation-group-label
GetAllNamedOps handler test for NamedOp label
Added integration test to GetNamedOps with a label
Swagger example for AddNamedOperation with label
Fixed checkstyle changes, updated V2 userId

nodes.bodyText: It might be better to have a list of labels so that named operations can have more than one.

commit.message: Merge branch 'develop' of github.com:gchq/Gaffer into gh-791-add-named-operation-group-label
Add a list of labels to NamedOperations
